title: Online Workshop for Enhancing Creativity Based on Thai Higher Education Teacher Professional Standards: A Connectivist Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics education experience, basic online platform proficiency
context.additional_context: A blended asynchronous/synchronous activity structure optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, focusing on practical creativity development for in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more strategies for reconstructing mathematics education content based on the C5 Model.
Learners can design learner-engaged digital environments (e.g., Zoom Polling, Padlet) according to connectivism principles.
Learners can develop two creativity-enhancing instructional activities applying the AAA Model (Analyze-Assemble-Application).
Participants can perform peer feedback using evaluation rubrics aligned with Thai Teacher Professional Standards.

resources: Zoom Basic Features (Screen Sharing, Real-Time Chat)
Translated Thai Teacher Professional Standards Document
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
